summary: Adds 3 chests containing the materials you need to build your Hearthfire home
descriptionHtml:
A simple little mod that adds 3 chests - one to each location - which are actually doors that lead to a warehouse containing all the items you'll need to build and furnish your home. You'll end up more than you need: dump it back in the warehouse, or sell the extra. The warehouse also provides rapid transport between your houses.

Mod also includes the amulets, gems and other items for the more unique house furnishings.

The chest includes 5000g in cash and since it's already at the building site before anything else is, you can use that to purchase the land deed.

Very obviously requires Hearthfire.

This mod is aimed at the player who wants the fun of seeing their house go up but doesn't want to rummage around to find all the bits - or just someone in a hurry.
author: Princess Stomper
